hero.title: Unlocking Liquidity for Your Global Mineral Holdings
hero.subtitle: Empowering mineral owners worldwide with a seamless path to liquidity.
hero.description: MXTK, short for Mineral Token, stands as a pioneering force in the realm of asset-backed cryptocurrency, dedicated to unlocking liquidity for mineral asset owners across the globe. Through a seamless and transparent process, we empower asset holders by minting 1:1 asset-backed Mineral Tokens, facilitating their trade on prominent crypto marketplaces. As your partner in liquidity solutions, MXTK transforms mineral wealth into a tangible and tradeable digital currency, bridging the gap between traditional mineral assets and the evolving world of cryptocurrency.

opportunity.heading: Opportunity
points: Vast mineral wealth exists worldwide both within mines and unmined.
Prices and values of mines and minerals are rising exponentially.
Monetizing these assets could unlock significant capital for wealth generation pre-extraction.

problem.heading: The Problem
points: Selling assets can lead to loss of ownership and control.
Finding trustworthy buyers can be challenging.
Traditional financing options are limited for both mined and unmined assets.

solution.heading: The Solution
solution.description: We offer mineral asset owners liquidity by minting 1:1 asset-backed Mineral Tokens (MXTK), which can be traded on crypto marketplaces.

investment_opportunity.heading: Investment Opportunity
subpoints: Global mineral demand is soaring; with Mineral Token (MXTK), investors can tap into this rising market.
Our tokens offer a diversified mineral asset blend, reducing risks and increasing the potential for long-term gains.
Mineral Token (MXTK) links investors to global mineral assets, offering diverse opportunities.
As mineral asset owners gain liquidity, investors can profit from rising mineral demand and prices, benefiting both parties.

how_it_works.heading: How it works
steps: Our Third-party experts independently appraise and validate mineral assets. (Asset Verification)
Convert your mineral assets to MXTK tokens on a 1:1 basis & secure the SKR and/or deeds. (MXTK Tokens & Lock)
Trade or sell tokens on global crypto exchanges. (Liquidity)

requirements.heading: What is required
options: 43-101 REPORT: Includes detailed geological and technical assessments, ensuring transparency and reliability.
JORC REPORT: Provides guidelines for the public reporting of exploration results, mineral resources, and ore reserves.
SKR (SAFE KEEPING RECEIPT): Proves ownership of mineral assets securely held.

fees.heading: Pricing and Fees
structure: Liquidity Fee: The Liquidity Fee covers the setup, validation, and conversion of your mineral assets into tradable tokens on crypto exchanges, streamlining liquidity generation.

Network Gas Fee: The Network Gas Fee covers ongoing support, compliance, and transaction costs for selling Tokens on crypto exchanges, ensuring your assets' continued support and compliance on Mineral Token.
No Hidden Costs: At Mineral Token, we value transparency with no hidden fees.

about.heading: About
about.content:
Mineral Token was founded by the leadership of BV INNOVATION, which has deep experience in cryptocurrency, finance, and working in the mining industry. Over $33 Billion in mineral assets were committed at launch.

"BV INNOVATION is making big bets in AI, mineral extraction and refinement, and clean energy solutions, among others. As the world moves from fossil fuels to new energy solutions, we are only beginning the journey. With Mineral Token, stakeholders in the marketplace can move faster to bring the resources to market. We see it as a natural extension of our investment strategy." — Bo Vargas

institutional_finance.title: MXTK in Institutional Finance: 20 Applications Driving the On-Chain Economy in 2025
institutional_finance.executive_summary: As of August 25, 2025, the financial landscape has undergone a significant structural evolution, driven by the maturation of distributed ledger technology (DLT) and the institutional adoption of tokenized real-world assets (RWAs). At the epicenter of this transformation is the MXTK token, which has established itself as a pivotal infrastructure asset within the on-chain capital markets. With a market capitalization of $37 billion, supported by $500 million in public liquidity on decentralized exchanges like Uniswap and a consistent $5 million in daily trading volume, MXTK functions as the native utility, governance, and settlement asset for a dominant, multi-chain protocol designed for regulated financial instruments.

market_data.ecosystem_role: Native utility, governance, and settlement asset

categories.capital_liquidity_optimization: Use cases that allow institutions to manage their balance sheets more efficiently, unlock trapped capital, and reduce systemic risk through instantaneous settlement and enhanced collateral mobility.
categories.new_product_market_creation: Applications that leverage tokenization to create novel financial instruments, open previously inaccessible markets to a wider range of investors, and generate new sources of alpha and yield.
categories.operational_process_automation: Implementations that use smart contracts and DLT to automate complex, manual workflows, thereby reducing costs, minimizing errors, and increasing transactional speed and transparency.
categories.democratized_access_distribution: Strategies that fractionalize ownership of high-value, illiquid assets, lowering barriers to entry and enabling broader distribution to new investor segments, such as high-net-worth individuals (HNWIs).

use_cases.description: Banks tokenize money market fund holdings for instantaneous repo transactions with atomic settlement, replacing slow traditional processes with real-time liquidity management.
European banks transfer tokenized government bonds as collateral to US counterparties in minutes, 24/7, qualifying as Group 1a assets with same risk weighting as underlying bonds.
Corporate bonds issued on MXTK platform with smart contracts automating coupon payments, eliminating paying agents and providing real-time ownership registry.

use_cases.benefit: SME Financing, Narrowing Trade Finance Gap
use_cases.description: SME invoices tokenized and sold into institutional liquidity pools, connecting global capital with SME financing needs through transparent, verified receivables.
Proprietary trading firms exploit price dislocations between tokenized and traditional asset markets, particularly during off-hours trading when traditional markets are closed.

use_cases.application: Yield Generation via RWA Liquidity Pools
use_cases.description: Hedge funds provide liquidity to institutional RWA trading pools, earning fee-based income tied to real-world asset trading volume, uncorrelated to crypto markets.
Quantitative funds exploit yield differentials between tokenized and traditional instruments while hedging interest rate risk through delta-neutral strategies.
Funds accumulate MXTK tokens for governance rights, taking early positions in underlying assets before tokenization proposals pass, capturing liquidity premiums.
PE firms launch tokenized feeder funds with automated capital calls and distributions, lowering minimums from $5M to $100K and servicing thousands of smaller investors.
LP stakes tokenized for trading on regulated secondary marketplaces, providing transparent price discovery and instant settlement for previously illiquid interests.
PE firms issue subordinated debt as security tokens for LBOs, accessing global investor networks and streamlining syndication with digital processes.
Pre-IPO companies issue employee stock options as tokens with automated vesting schedules and secondary market access for early liquidity.
Trading houses use tokenized gold as instant, 24/7 collateral for margin calls, optimizing capital usage and reducing counterparty risk across weekends and holidays.
Luxury goods tokenized with immutable provenance records, enabling lenders to verify authenticity and chain of custody for secure asset-backed financing.
Carbon credits tokenized with verified project metadata, creating transparent global marketplace with instant settlement and immutable compliance records.
Retailers tokenize inventory connected to real-time warehouse data, enabling dynamic credit facilities that adjust automatically based on stock levels.
Wealth managers construct precise real estate portfolios using fractionalized tokens, enabling specific geographic and sector exposures previously impossible.
Institutional trades settle using tokenized money market funds instead of stablecoins, eliminating cash drag while maintaining yield through atomic DvP settlement.
Flight delay insurance automatically pays out based on oracle data triggers, eliminating claims processing and providing instant, frictionless customer experience.
Catastrophe bonds fractionalized as tokens, democratizing access to uncorrelated insurance risk and increasing overall reinsurance market capacity.

regulatory_framework.basel_iii_compliance: Group 1a classification treats tokenized traditional assets with same risk weighting as underlying assets, removing capital penalties for banks.
regulatory_framework.regulatory_sandboxes: Singapore's Project Guardian and EU's DLT Pilot Regime provide controlled environments for regulatory development and legal precedent.
regulatory_framework.legal_finality: Smart contracts structured as legally binding agreements with on-chain ledger as definitive ownership record.

infrastructure_safeguards.permissioned_defi: Whitelisted, KYC-verified institutional participation maintaining sovereignty while enabling cross-network efficiency.
infrastructure_safeguards.institutional_liquidity: Separate, professional market-maker capitalized pools for institutional treasury operations beyond public DEX pools.
infrastructure_safeguards.surety_bonds: Protocol governing body secures substantial insurance bonds providing financial recourse guarantees for institutional members.
infrastructure_safeguards.regulated_custody: Specialized digital asset custodians using Multi-Party Computation (MPC) with bonded insurance against security breaches.
infrastructure_safeguards.oracle_security: Decentralized Oracle Networks aggregate data from dozens of independent sources with specialized manipulation insurance coverage.

validator_program.heading: MXTK Asset Validator Program
validator_program.description: A game-theoretic framework for decentralized due diligence using expert validators to verify mineral asset authenticity, ownership, and value before tokenization.

validator_roles.generalist_validator: Entry-level role for users staking minimum MXTK tokens, reviews AI/MCP data packets and public information
validator_roles.certified_specialist: Validators with verified professional credentials (geologists, auditors, legal experts) whose votes carry greater weight in their field
validator_roles.validation_syndicates: Multi-signature groups pooling reputation and capital for collaboration and risk-sharing

economic_model.asset_complexity_score: ACS rating 1-10 based on asset type, jurisdictional risk, value, and data quality
economic_model.integrity_fee: Base prize paid by MXTK treasury, fixed amount scaled by ACS, rewarded regardless of outcome
economic_model.minting_bonus: Success prize up to 0.75% of tokenized value, paid by asset owner only if validation succeeds

validation_process.due_diligence_period: Up to 120 days for validator analysis and voting
validation_process.challenge_period: 30 days for validators to challenge provisional outcomes
validation_process.arbitration_round: Binding decision by randomized larger validator pool if challenged

penalties_slashing.against_consensus: 25-50% stake slash for voting against final consensus
penalties_slashing.losing_arbitration: Challengers lose entire bond, redistributed to winners
penalties_slashing.inactivity: Partial slash and reputation loss for staking without voting

reward_vesting.mirror_vesting: Validator rewards vest on same schedule as client token issuance
reward_vesting.cliff_period: 12-month cliff before any rewards become liquid
reward_vesting.utility_during_lockup: Locked rewards can boost validator stake weight and governance voting
reward_vesting.clawback_provision: Protocol reserves right to claw back rewards for proven misconduct
